summary: dbext 506 with added capabilities for Rdb
name: dbext4rdb
description:
For vim on Open VMS look at http://www.polarhome.com/vim/
For Open VMS http://h71000.www7.hp.com/openvms/

The "official" dbext 5.11 release (and any future ones) has incorporated the
Oracle Rdb Open VMS support.  Please refer to the dbext homepage for further
updates:
http://vim.sourceforge.net/scripts/script.php?script_id=356


If DBEXT_506_RDB.ZIP was installed, please verify it was not installed into
any of the vim70 or vim71 directories.  All plugins should be installed into
the .vim (Unix) or vimfiles (Windows) directories.  If you find any of the
dbext files in the vim7x directories, please remove these before installing
the official version.
